assignments_info.comment: Very nice drawing program! I really like the splatter feature; itâ€™s the first time I've seen anyone think of that. It is creative and easy to use. Good job!
Nice idle game. Good use of accelerometer and click and drag. I think its better than cookie clicker, not that that is saying much ;p
Cool Tic-Tac-Toe game! It works perfectly and it is very neatly organized. The only thing I question is the fact that X and O are not placed simply by clicking but have to move my cursor. Good job!
I see that you have carefully considered your future career. I wish you all the best in your endeavors to become a game designer!

Very nice multiplayer game! I see that you understand the concepts of sending messages. Good use of anonymous functions for mouse click functions. It has been a pleasure teaching you level 3. I hope you will come on some Saturdays to program with us!

Cool program! All the buttons work and there is a very organized HUD. There is a small glitch that after clearing the canvas, it forces the pen to turn into an eraser. The spray bottle also looks a bit strange because the drawn dots are not fills but strokes. But overall, good work!
Nice modification of your punishing car game. While it is somewhat less punishing, it is still not completely intuitive turn using left and right joystick. Good job though!
Nice tag game, it is super fun to play. The copied version is missing some stuff, but I re-copied the original file and it works properly. You should make this into a mobile game. Great job!
Insightful research has been done about game designers. It is also good to see that you have thought about how to become a game designer. All the best in the future!

Super interesting mechanics! It turned out to be a bit difficult to stop the player from hacking through the game due to its flexibility, but I think it was designed well. Hopefully you will create more levels and mechanics in the future! Feel free to join us on Saturdays to continue this project.

Good job! The program can perform all of the basic functions. Your program also gives errors from the Camera built-in class because you have an extara camera layer that is not needed. When I select a different color it draws a segment in old color and then switches; I'm not sure what is wrong either because I think your code makes sense.
Great job implementing the joystick to make a cool interactive maze game! Why do I respawn in different locations when I am hit from different places though?

Very detailed report on computer programmers. Good to see that you have a clear direction for the career you wish to pursue in life. I wish you all the best in your endeavors to become a computer programmer!

Nice mobile platformer game. However, the controls are a bit difficult to use. You should make the blocks a class in themselves for better reusability and organization. Good job on modifying the joystick to include the flip function. You should use hitTestPoint instead of hitTestObject when programming many walls. I beat your game with 791 points! Good job putting save data on it as well. I wish you all the best in the future and hope that you will join us on some Saturdays!
